ValidationRule.description: US-0009554 - Block deals acceptance if Seller Rev Roll Up is CH or UK
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c), EBH_Subsidy__c > 0, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Deal_V1', ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealSiteId__c, "77"), ISCHANGED( EBH_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,"Planned"), OR( ISPICKVAL(EBH_BusinessName__r.EBH_RevRollup__c, "CH"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_BusinessName__r.EBH_RevRollup__c, "UK") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Due to the Seller registration is in UK/Switzerland, Deal Acceptance is not possible on Subsidized Deals. For further clarifications please contact EU controlling.
